嶓字的基本解释

嶓
bō
〔嶓冢〕古山名（a.在今中国甘肃省成县东北；b.在今中国陕西省勉县西南）。

嶓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bō］
［《廣韻》博禾切，平戈，幫。］
嶓冢山的省称。山在今甘肃省。

嶓字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶓； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页319第31
【廣韻】博禾切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】補禾切，?音波。嶓冢，山名。【書·禹貢】嶓冢導漾。【註】卽梁州之嶓山，形如冢，故名。【前漢·地理志】山在隴西郡氐道縣，漢水出焉。　又【五音集韻】補過切，音播。義同。

嶓字的源字形

嶓字的起名意思

嶓冢山的省称。山在今甘肃省。

嶓
Basic explanation of words
嶓
bō
〔嶓嶓〕Ancient mountain name (a. in the northeast of Chengxian County, Gansu Province, China; b. in the southwest of Mian County, Shaanxi Province, China).
嶓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bō］
["Guang Yun" Bo Heqie, Ping Ge, Bang. ]
The provincial name of Shizuka Mountain. The mountains are in present-day Gansu Province.
嶓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶓; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 319 31
[Guang Yun] Bo He Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Fill He Cut, sound wave. Shizuka, the name of the mountain. 【Book·Yugong】Guide Yang from the Tomb. [Note] The mountain in Liangzhou is shaped like a mound, hence the name. [Pre-Han·Geography] The mountain is in Didao County, Longxi County, and the Han River flows out of Yan.　[Pentagram Rhyme] Make up the cut, audio broadcast. The same meaning.
